message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,000. I know it's a fair price, considering its value to you. Let me know your thoughts!
Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product to you, but I believe we can come to an agreement closer to its actual worth to me. How about $9,500?
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $9,500 is a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $10,500, which still leaves some room for us both to be happy. Let's make this deal happen!
